Submodules

rcm.rcminit module

rcm.rcminit.LoadDKTab(fIn='dktable')
rcm.rcminit.LoadEnchan(fIn='enchan.dat')
rcm.rcminit.LoadLAS1(fIn='rcmlas1')

rcm.rcmutils module

rcm.rcmutils.getClosedRegionMask(s5)
rcm.rcmutils.getCumulPress(ilamc, vm, eetas, doFraction=False)

Returns 3D array of cumulative presures ilamc: [Nk] lambda values (Nk NOT the full number of energy channels, can be subset) vm : [Nj,Ni] vm value eetas: [Nk,Nj,Ni] eetas corresponding to ilamc values doFraction: return cumulative pressure fraction instead of cumulative pressure

rcm.rcmutils.getSpecieslambdata(rcmS0, species='ions')
rcm.rcmutils.getValAtLoc_linterp(val, xData, yData, getAxis='y')

Use linear interpolation to find desired x/y values in data val: x/y value to find y/x location of xData/yData: 1D arrays of equal length getAxis: desired axis. If ‘y’, assumes targets are x values, and visa versa

rcm.rcmutils.updateFactors(rxNew)

rcm.rcmxdmf module

RCM-specific tools to include h5 data in xmf files

rcm.rcmxdmf.addRCMGeom(Geom, dimInfo, rcmInfo, sID)
rcm.rcmxdmf.addRCMVars(Grid, dimInfo, rcmInfo, sID)
